itemLabel: Clifford Allen, 1st Baron Allen of Hurtwood

wikipedia_page.main: Reginald Clifford Allen, 1st Baron Allen of Hurtwood (9 May 1889 – 3 March 1939), known as Clifford Allen, was a British politician, leading member of the Independent Labour Party (ILP), and prominent pacifist.

response: *Clifford Allen, 1st Baron Allen of Hurtwood (1889–1939), politician and peace campaigner
